title: Search the Cellar
content:
ght next to the waypoint. Read the Apothecary's Ledger on the bar to learn about the cellar of the house. The cellar can be accessed through a hatch on the floor underneath the window behind the bar.

In the northwest side of the first cellar room, you can find a Healer's Log that you can take a look at to make a future dialogue choice easier to make. When you approach this side of the cellar, your party will roll automatic Perception Checks. If anyone succeeds, you'll find a hidden lever nearby
